markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you do not have any [accepted IDs for GCash verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification), we recommend registering for a **National ID**.

Visit the [PSA's official website](https://philsys.gov.ph/registration-process/) for registration instructions and required documents or check [PSA Registration Centers](https://philsys.gov.ph/registration-center/) near your area.

If you've applied for a National ID but haven't received your physical or paper National ID, you can download your Digital National ID via the [PSA website](https://national-id.gov.ph/) or the [eGov PH app](https://e.gov.ph/).

Get started with your GCash verification by tapping **Profile** \> **Verify Now.**

### **Need more Help?**

Check out the articles below about verifying your GCash account
